languages.text: Сказал{mf||а} Хейнриксу, что еретический когитатор должен завершить работу, чтобы оправдать жертву погибших.
Told Heinrix that the heretical cogitator had to be allowed to complete its work to justify the lives lost.
languages.original_text: Сказал{mf||а} Хейнриксу, что еретический когитатор должен завершить работу, чтобы оправдать жертву погибших.

traits.locale_text: Told Heinrix that the heretical cogitator had to be allowed to complete its work to justify the lives lost.
Told Heinrix that the heretical cogitator had to be allowed to complete its work to justify the lives lost.
Told Heinrix that the heretical cogitator had to be allowed to complete its work to justify the lives lost.
Told Heinrix that the heretical cogitator had to be allowed to complete its work to justify the lives lost.
Told Heinrix that the heretical cogitator had to be allowed to complete its work to justify the lives lost.

languages.text: 你告诉海因里希，必须让那台异端沉思者完成计算，这样那些逝去的生命才没有白白牺牲。
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that the heretical cogitator had to be allowed to complete its work to justify the lives lost.

traits.locale_text: 你告诉海因里希，必须让那台异端思考器完成计算，这样那些逝去的生命才没有白白牺牲。

languages.text: Heinrix befohlen, den ketzerischen Cogitator seine Arbeit abschließen zu lassen, um die verlorenen Leben zu rechtfertigen.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that the heretical cogitator had to be allowed to complete its work to justify the lives lost.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix befohlen, den ketzerischen Cogitator seine Arbeit abschließen zu lassen, um die verlorenen Leben zu rechtfertigen.

languages.text: Vous avez dit à Heinrix que le cogitateur hérétique devait achever sa tâche pour que tous ces sacrifices n'aient pas été vains.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that the heretical cogitator had to be allowed to complete its work to justify the lives lost.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez dit à Heinrix que le cogitateur hérétique devait achever sa tâche pour que tous ces sacrifices n'aient pas été vains.

languages.text: Has ordenado a Heinrix que permita que el cogitador hereje termine su labor para justificar las vidas sacrificadas.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that the heretical cogitator had to be allowed to complete its work to justify the lives lost.

traits.locale_text: Has ordenado a Heinrix que permita que el cogitador hereje termine su labor para justificar las vidas sacrificadas.

languages.text: ハインリックスに、失われた命を正当化するためには、異端の考算機が作業を完了させなければならないと告げた。
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that the heretical cogitator had to be allowed to complete its work to justify the lives lost.

traits.locale_text: ハインリックスに、失われた命を正当化するためには、異端の考算機が作業を完了させなければならないと告げた。

languages.text: Heinrix'e, kaybedilen canların boşa yitmemiş olması için kâfir kavramsayarın işlemini tamamlaması gerektiğini söyledin.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix that the heretical cogitator had to be allowed to complete its work to justify the lives lost.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix’e kaybedilen canların boşa gitmemesi için kâfir kavramsayarının işlemini tamamlaması gerektiğini söyledin.
